channel.name: simpleDBRead

properties.select: SELECT patient.pid AS patient_pid, patient.name AS patient_name, patient.sex AS patient_sex, patient.dob AS patient_dob, patient.addr AS patient_addr, patient.ssn AS patient_ssn, patient.status AS patient_status FROM patient where status>=0
properties.update: update patient set status=-1 where pid=${patient_pid}

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: create HL7

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

channel.name: HL7TOTXT
channel.description: this channel will convert a HL7 file into text file

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: convert hl7 to text

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

channel.name: db to soap webservice
channel.description: this channel will query db data,then call soap webservice to send

properties.select: SELECT patient.pid AS patient_pid, patient.name AS patient_name, patient.sex AS patient_sex, patient.dob AS patient_dob, patient.addr AS patient_addr, patient.ssn AS patient_ssn, patient.status AS patient_status FROM patient where status=-4
properties.update: update patient set status=-3 where pid=${patient_pid}

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: convert name to f and l
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script: combinedNameString = msg['patient_name'].toString() arrName = combinedNameString.split(" ") tmp['fname'] = arrName[0] tmp['lname'] = arrName[1]

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
